name: MIS Financial Reconciliation Summary
description: v1.0 This report shows establishment level totals (opening and closing balances) for Cash, Spend and Savings accounts based on the date chosen at runtime.

dataset.name: Account Balances
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_NAME, SUM(COALESCE(CASE WHEN NOT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK IS NULL THEN AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CURRENT_BALANCE END, 0)) AS SUM_OF_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE, SUM(COALESCE(CASE WHEN NOT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK IS NULL THEN AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.HOLD_BALANCE END, 0)) AS SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51, AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID, AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE, BODIMIS.CASELOADS AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES WHERE (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.BALANCE_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK (+)) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CASELOAD_ID = AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.TRUST_ACCOUNTS_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE = (SELECT TXN_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Transaction Date','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID <> 'ZZGHI') GROUP BY AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_NAME, AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID, AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.DESCRIPTION), dataset_ AS (SELECT ACCOUNT_NAME, SUM_OF_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE, SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51, CASELOAD_ID, DESCRIPTION, SUM_OF_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE || SUM(TRANSACTION_AMOUNT_CR_DR) AS T_V_NEW_CLOSING_BALANCE, T_V_NEW_CLOSING_BALANCE || SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51 AS T_V_NEW_GROSS_BALANCE FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51
field.display: Sum of Private Cash Account Holding Opening-Balance

dataset.name: New Transactions
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE, SUM(CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'CR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT WHEN AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'DR' THEN -AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT END) AS TRANSACTION_AMOUNT_CR_DR, AT_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID, AT_CASELOADS.DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.CASELOADS AT_CASELOADS, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE = (SELECT TXN_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Transaction Date','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND AT_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID <> 'ZZGHI') GROUP BY AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE, AT_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID, AT_CASELOADS.DESCRIPTION), dataset_ AS (SELECT ACCOUNT_NAME, TRANSACTION_TYPE, TRANSACTION_AMOUNT_CR_DR, CASELOAD_ID, DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Account Names
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN WHERE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE IN (2101, 2102, 2103)), dataset_ AS (SELECT ACCOUNT_NAME FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT TRUNC(BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_END_DATETIME) AS LOAD_END_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT LOAD_END_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51
field.display: Sum of Private Cash Account Holding Opening-Balance

field.name: $ref:T_V_NEW_GROSS_BALANCE
field.legacySql: =[t_v_New_Closing_Balance]+[Sum of Private Cash Account Holding Opening-Balance]
